review.title: “Typical small Taiwanese company”
review.pros: Pros – Ambitious planning and wide connections to the technology sector in Taiwan. Wide connections to Taiwanese energy manufacturers and an extensive partnership network around Latin America. Also chances to participate in the development of new products.
review.cons: Cons – Limited experience of international sales and cooperation with foreign clients. The company culture does not always encourage thinking outside of the box as the senior leadership wishes to control the company at all levels.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Like in many small Taiwanese and Asian companies the best atittude to task is to remember that you are an employee. Following commands and only giving constructive criticism are as far as your should go.
